column5: Found this in someone's trash (at the curb).   I've met the guy before and know he fishes and even gave me a bunch of crappie before.  Looks like everything is there, no holes, all the poles etc. are in good shape.   What do you think the red modification is for?  IMG_1825 by Joeyfishing, on Flickr  IMG_1826 by Joeyfishing, on Flickr
Travel through deep snow?. . Is there a prize for correct answer??
My guess is that the Clam shelter broke, and he tried to make skis to pull the sled easier with... Thru 2+ feet of snow apparently lol!!!
Well both interesting theories     I'm sure we'll find some use for it, or if someone is interested in buying it, let me know.
I'll give you twice what you paid for it.lol You know how much ice fishing we do down here.   Art
They call it a smitty sled. Easy travel towing. Many versions by many people. I am working on one myself from an old one man flip over. Nice find J
Is that a one man scout?  S.
